content.text: Learn how to maintain the aspect ratio of an element with CSS.
content.html: Learn how to maintain the aspect ratio of an element with CSS.

content.text: Create flexible elements that keep their aspect ratio (4:3, 16:9, etc.) when resized:
content.html: Create flexible elements that keep their aspect ratio (4:3, 16:9, etc.) when resized:

content.text: What is aspect ratio? The aspect ratio of an element describes the proportional relationship between its width and its height. Two common video aspect ratios are 4:3 (the universal video format of the 20th century), and 16:9 (universal for HD television and European digital television, and default for YouTube videos).
content.html:
What is aspect ratio?

The aspect ratio of an element describes the proportional relationship between its width and its height. Two common video aspect ratios are 4:3 (the universal video format of the 20th century), and 16:9 (universal for HD television and European digital television, and default for YouTube videos).

content.text: How To - Height Equal to Width
Use a container element, like <div>, and if you want text inside of it, add a child element:
content.html: Use a container element, like <div>, and if you want text inside of it, add a child element:

syntaxHighlighting.text:
<!-- If 
you want text inside the container -->

content.code: Some text

syntax_highlighting.text:
<!-- If 
you want text inside the container -->

content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <div class="text">Some text</div> <!-- If you want text inside the container -->
</div>

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
<!-- If 
you want text inside the container -->

content.text: Add a percentage value for padding-top to maintain the aspect ratio of the DIV. The following example will create an aspect ratio of 1:1 (the height and width is always equal):
content.html: Add a percentage value for padding-top to maintain the aspect ratio of the DIV. The following example will create an aspect ratio of 1:1 (the height and width is always equal):

syntaxHighlighting.text:
background-color: red;  width: 100%;
    padding-top: 100%; /* 1:1 Aspect 
Ratio */  position: relative; /* If you want 
text inside of it */

/* If you want 
text inside of it */

/* If you 
want text inside of the container */
position: absolute;  top: 0;  left: 0;  bottom: 0;  right: 0;

syntax_highlighting.text:
background-color: red;  width: 100%;
    padding-top: 100%; /* 1:1 Aspect 
Ratio */  position: relative; /* If you want 
text inside of it */

/* If you want 
text inside of it */

/* If you 
want text inside of the container */
position: absolute;  top: 0;  left: 0;  bottom: 0;  right: 0;

content.code_html:
.container {
  background-color: red;
  width: 100%;
  padding-top: 100%; /* 1:1 Aspect Ratio */
  position: relative; /* If you want text inside of it */
}

/* If you want text inside of the container */
.text {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  right: 0;
}

syntax_highlighting_data.text:
background-color: red;  width: 100%;
    padding-top: 100%; /* 1:1 Aspect 
Ratio */  position: relative; /* If you want 
text inside of it */

/* If you want 
text inside of it */

/* If you 
want text inside of the container */
position: absolute;  top: 0;  left: 0;  bottom: 0;  right: 0;

content.code_html:
.container {
  padding-top: 56.25%; /* 16:9 Aspect Ratio (divide 9 by 16 = 0.5625) */
}

.container {
  padding-top: 75%; /* 4:3 Aspect Ratio (divide 3 by 4 = 0.75) */
}

.container {
  padding-top: 66.66%; /* 3:2 Aspect Ratio (divide 2 by 3 = 0.6666)  */
}

.container {
  padding-top: 62.5%; /* 8:5 Aspect Ratio (divide 5 by 8 = 0.625) */
}

content.text: In newer browsers, you can simply use the CSS aspect-ratio property:
content.html: In newer browsers, you can simply use the CSS aspect-ratio property:

content.code_html:
.container {
  aspect-ratio: 3 / 2;
}

content.text: The numbers in the table specify the first browser version that fully supports the property.
content.html: The numbers in the table specify the first browser version that fully supports the property.

content.code_html:
Property
aspect-ratio 88 88 89 15 74
